attributes.action: Teach our children about the Natural World and Conservation on the curriculum .
attributes.additional_details: Earth has lost half of its wildlife in the past 40 years, not enough is done in schools to educate the future generation on the importance of the Natural World and the importance of conserving what we have left. I believe that if schools educate children in a stand alone lesson on the curriculum about these issues and teach them about all that resides in the Natural Kingdom then our wildlife may stand a chance. Plant a seed now and it will grow.
